attributes.action: help create a safer environment for drivers and pedestrians on the A61 Penistone Road, Sheffield.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After multiple fatalities & many other minor collisions on the A61 Penistone Road, Sheffield, we feel that the traffic management needs to be reassessed. As well as raising awareness about road safety in the area we want one/some of the following actions to be taken; 

* Safety barriers
* Single lane filtering
* Traffic Lights
* Changes in speed limit
* Speed cameras/bumps in conjunction with other measures
